text.section: The Executive Director of the Department of Legislative Services, subject to the approval of the President and Speaker, shall appoint an attorney to serve as Counsel to the Committee.

The assistance of the Counsel to members of the General Assembly:
is subject to the attorney client privilege, as set forth in § 9-108 of the Courts Article;
is subject to confidentiality under § 15-516 of this article; and
is intended as a service to the members and may not be deemed to diminish a member's personal responsibility for adherence to applicable laws, rules, and standards of ethical conduct.
The Committee shall have other staff assistance as requested by the Committee and as provided in the budget of the General Assembly.
